entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
